comments: Sum_{d|n} a(d) = A018804(n), Mobius transform of A018804. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 19 2004Dirichlet convolution of A000010 with itself. - _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 28 2015
formula: Sum_{k=1..n} phi(gcd(n, k)). Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (e+1)*(p^e - p^(e - 1)) - (e - 1)*(p^(e - 1) - p^(e - 2)). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Oct 30 2001Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s-1)^2/zeta(s)^2. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 19 2004Equals row sums of triangle A143258. [From _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 02 2008]
maple: with(numtheory): A029935 := proc(n) local i,j; j := 0; for i in divisors(n) do j := j+phi(i)*phi(n/i); od; j; end;
crossrefs: Cf. A029936. Row sums of A159937.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
